item.title: Merge Nordic Buttonless DFU with NUS
item.description: Nordic provides good examples, but mostly independent from each other. To make a BLE UART service with DFU support, we’ll need to merge the two examples:

item.title: Nordic BLE Device Firmware Update Bootloader
item.description: Noric provides detailed documentations of Bootloader and DFU modules
